reuters.title: HUDSON FOODS <HFI> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
reuters.body: Hudson Foods Inc said it has agreed in principle to acquire Thies Cos Inc, a poultry, beef and pork products provider to midwest supermarkets and food distributors with sales of about 69 mln dlrs for the year ended November One. The company said a definitive agreement is expected to be signed in April. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter 
